content.html: Mommy's here to support you when running cargo~ ❤️ Just `cargo install cargo-mommy` and she'll take care of you~ ❤️ You can set CARGO_MOMMYS_LITTLE in your environment to any affectionate term you want, and be mommy's little boy or mommy's little kitten~ ❤️
content.value:
Mommy's here to support you when running cargo~ ❤️

Just `cargo install cargo-mommy` and she'll take care of you~ ❤️

You can set CARGO_MOMMYS_LITTLE in your environment to any affectionate term you want, and be mommy's little boy or mommy's little kitten~ ❤️

photo.alt:
screenshot of running `cargo mommy clippy` successfully and getting the following after normal output of `cargo clippy`:

Good girl~
Mommy's so proud of you~ ❤️

screenshot of running `cargo mommy test` unsuccessfully and getting the following after normal output of `cargo test`:

Mommy knows her little girl can do better~ ❤️
